description: Welcome to Vulpguard! So good to see a fresh new face. I hope you are less lazy than the last folks that came through here?
My hot tub ahem I mean the town's fountain is still not finished! Its a disgrace, no sense of civic duty!
Why dont you visit Jack, the lumberâ€¦ guy. He'll sort you out with an axe so you can start to make yourself useful.
You're back! Did you get the axe from Jack?
Nice axe... now get to work!
You must be the new guy. I'm Jack, the lumber guy. I heard you need an axe?
You can use this axe to chop down trees and gather wood. Just be careful with it, it's sharp!
You can find trees to chop down all around the town. Just walk up to a tree to chop it down.
This is a basic axe, so it won't cut down the bigger trees. You'll need a better axe for that.
Oh this axe isn't free, you know. You can pay me back by chopping down some trees for me. I need some wood for a new project.
Where's my wood? I need that wood to finish my project!
Oh good, you're back, and with wood... nice work!
You can keep the axe, it's like the worst axe I've ever made. But it's yours now.
Why don't you visit Milly? She gets kinda lonely and is a little shy
but I think she's super cool so say hi from me.
Do you ever get the feeling that the world is spinning really fast?
Maybe it is... or maybe I should just stop watching this windmill turn...
Sorry, how dizzy of me, I'm Milly, could I ask you for a massive favour?
Would you use this Scythe to cut me some flax, it's so pretty!
Where's my lovely flax?
Oh how lovely! Beautiful flax!
I've found that I prefer punching rocks nowadays.
It's so much more carcinogenic, mmm that's not right,
Cartharticogenic, that's the word I was looking for.
So lucky for you I don't need this pickaxe any more
However I do need some stone, so off you go!
Where's my stone, or do you want a punch?
Stones! Bah they're just small rocks, no good for punching!
Would you take this letter to Milly?
It's not what you think... I just don't like her feeling lonely
I wrote down some funny jokes, it might cheer her up
Anyway, non of your business is it? Sorry, just a bit nervous!
Delivered the letter to Milly yet?
Did she laugh? Erm in a good way?
Oh how exciting a letter! Who's it from?
Is if from Jack? I bet it's from Jack!
Oh this joke is so funny! This joke is a bit rude!
Tell him to send me more!
